pullRequest.title: [#2131] Check for tenant existence in device registration operations in MongoDB device registry
pullRequest.bodyText: With this PR, while registering devices, the existence of the tenant is now being verified using TenantInformationService.

nodes.bodyText: I do not think that this is necessary because the assert Registration operation explicitly defines how to handle the case when there is no device matching the criteria ...
this is an internal operation that is invoked as part of one of the public API operations. The existence of the tenant should already have been checked there ...
